titleStmt.title: Thermæ redivivæ, the city of Bath described with some observations on those soveraign waters, both as to the bathing in, and drinking of them, now so much in use / by Henry Chapman ...
titleStmt.author: Chapman, Henry, fl. 1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Jonathan Edwin ...,
